original: apply is_lim_seq_p_infty_Reals. unfold cv_infty. intros M. exists (Z.to_nat (Qceiling M)). intros n Hn. unfold ge in Hn. unfold Z.to_nat in Hn. unfold Qceiling in Hn. unfold Q2R in Hn. pose (lt_0_INR n) as H_lt. apply (Z.lt_le_trans (Z.neq_postive (n_neq_0 H_lt) 1)) in Hn. apply lt_IR in Hn. rewrite Z.eqb_neq in H_lt. simpl in Hn. unfold R_dist. rewrite Rabs_left1. + apply R_lt_trans with 0%R. -- unfold Qceiling. rewrite lt_R_ge_to_le. apply INR_lt. apply lt_pred_n_0_nat. -- rewrite <- S_O_plus_INR. rewrite plus_INR. rewrite S_INR. apply R_lt_R_inv. apply Rinv_lt_contravar. ++ apply Rmult_lt_0_compat. ** apply INR_lt. apply lt_O_Sn. ** unfold lt. apply IZR_lt. apply I. ++ apply lt_O_Sn. + apply Rlt_le. apply lt_0_INR. apply lt_0_Sn. apply Rplus_lt_compat_r with INR n. apply Hn.
